Classes¶

class Signature(parameters, return_annotation=None)¶

Represents a function’s parameter signature and return annotation.

Implements the same interface as the inspect.Signature class.

Variables:
  • parameters – an OrderedDict of parameter names mapped to Parameter instances
  • return_annotation – the annotation for the return value, or Signature.empty
empty¶

alias of _empty

classmethod from_callable(callable)¶

Returns a matching Signature instance for the given callable.

Parameters:callable – a function or any other callable object
Returns:a corresponding Signature instance
classmethod from_signature(signature)¶

Creates a new Signature instance from an inspect.Signature instance.

Parameters:signature – an inspect.Signature instance
Returns:a new Signature instance
class Parameter(name, kind, default=None, annotation=<_ParameterKind.POSITIONAL_OR_KEYWORD: 1>)¶

Represents a function parameter.

Implements the same interface as the inspect.Parameter class.

Variables:
  • name – the parameter’s name
  • kind – the parameter’s kind. See inspect.Parameter.kind for details.
  • default – the parameter’s default value or Parameter.empty
  • annotation – the parameter’s type annotation
default_value¶

Synonym for Parameter.default.

empty¶

alias of _empty

classmethod from_parameter(parameter)¶

Creates a new Parameter instance from an inspect.Parameter instance.

Parameters:parameter – an inspect.Parameter instance
Returns:a new Parameter instance
